attributes.action: The DWP to issue details of Universal Credit BEFORE the election
attributes.additional_details:
The National Audit Office have asked the DWP to release details of Universal Credit.  Needless to say, they refused.  Also, a judge has asked them to reveal these details but the DWP have said that these details are to be kept under lock and key until after the election.

We call for the DWP to release these details as soon as possible.
